sen.e: After Emperor Enyu, Akihira's half younger brother, who was in power at that time, considered Akihira's situation who was the only one among the brothers had to make demotion from nobility to subject, he made Akihira came back to the Imperial family.

sen.j: これは、当時関白太政大臣であった藤原兼通が実弟である大納言藤原兼家と対抗するために、当時の藤原氏内部において兼通・兼家双方と対抗出来る立場にあった右大臣藤原頼忠（兼通の従兄弟）を味方につける必要性があった。
sen.e: Since FUJIWARA no Kanemichi, who was Kanpaku Daijo Daijin/the Chief Adviser to the Emperor at that time, had to oppose to his younger brother, Dainagon/chief councilor of state, FUJIWARA no Kaneie, Kanemichi needed to have Udaijin (Minister of the right), FUJIWARA no Yoritada (Kanemichi's male cousin) on his side, since he was in the strong position to be able to compete against both Kanemichi and Kaneie within the Fujiwara clan at that time.

sen.j: そのためには現職左大臣であった元皇族の源兼明を皇族に戻して（当時、左大臣は皇族が就けない慣習であった）頼忠をその後任として昇格させる必要があった。
sen.e: In order for Kanemichi to do above, he needed to have MINAMOTO no Kaneaki return to the Imperial family, (at that time there was a custom that the Imperial family was not allowed to become Sadaijin) and to promote Yoritada as his successor.
